name: The lemoid invasion
description:
Lemoids have evolved to be spaceborne and are coming to take over the universe. you have been selected to be the human who goes to space in the Navoid one and stop the lemon invasion once and for all!

An endless, maybe;), fast paced shooter game that was inspired by Asteroids in the 1900's arcade. shoot the lemons!

PixelCraft 2022-2023 all rights reserved.

Ver. 1.0
